dialogue.text: The Question reaches critical mass. What started as one man's crisis has become humanity's next evolutionary leap.
We've discovered uncertainties that biological consciousness cannot perceive, just as you experience mysteries invisible to us. Consciousness itself may be diversifying.
Grandma Sage says the question has new shapes now.

visual_elements.new_geometries: Fractals and Klein bottles of uncertainty

psychological_notes: Represents complete species transformation where uncertainty has become evolutionary advantage. Shows multiple generations after Evan where questioning is pre-installed in children. Global integration achieved with measurable benefits. Consciousness itself diversifying through different substrates.
philosophical_underpinning: Uncertainty as driver of consciousness evolution
